gmd:metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: ISO 19139 Geographic Information - Metadata - Implementation Specification

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Residential Care Facilities, Nursing Homes, and Hospices: Indiana, 2007

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: Indiana State Department of Health (ISDH) (Data source)

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: CARE_LONG_TERM_FACILITIES_ISDH_IN is a point shapefile showing the locations of 86 residential care facilities, 525 long-term care facilities (nursing homes), and 81 hospices included in various directories that appear on Web pages of the Indiana State Department of Health (ISDH). Using street addresses from the directory, a shapefile was created using the Geocoding tool in ESRI ArcMap 9.2 and street information licensed from Tele Atlas, Dynamap 2000 v. 17.0.

gmd:purpose.gco:CharacterString: This data set was compiled to create a GIS layer showing locations of residential care facilities, nursing homes, and hospices in Indiana.

gmd:credit.gco:CharacterString: Source data are from Indiana State Department of Health.

These data are intended for use only at the published scale or smaller and are for reference purposes only. They are not to be construed as a legal document or survey instrument. A detailed on-the-ground survey and historical analysis of a single site may differ from these data. gmd:otherConstraints.gco:CharacterString: This file is available to anyone, but access may be contingent on written request, specific terms relevant to the agency or person making the request, and (or) current freedom of information statutes in the state of Indiana.

gmd:environmentDescription.gco:CharacterString: ESRI ArcGIS version 9.2 shapefile format, approximately 480 Kb

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: 2007 Indiana State Department of Health Web site

gmd:supplementalInformation.gco:CharacterString: Indiana State Department of Health Web sites (http://www.in.gov/isdh/regsvcs/acc/hspcdir/wdirhspc.htm , http://www.in.gov/isdh/regsvcs/ltc/directory/wdirltc.htm , and http://www.in.gov/isdh/regsvcs/ltc/resdir/wdirres.htm ).

gmd:measureDescription.gco:CharacterString: No checks for logical consistency were made.
All residential care facilities, long-term care facilites (nursing homes), and hospices listed by the Indiana State Department of Health were included.

Street addresses and telephone numbers for residential care facilities, nursing homes, and hospices were obtained from the Web site of the Indiana State Department of Health and are assumed to be accurate. Geocoding produced match scores of more than 80 percent for 93 percent of residential care facilities, long-term care facilities (nursing homes), and hospices. Locations of other facilities with match scores that are less than 80 percent were plotted by personnel of the Indiana Geological Survey using the "Editor" tool in ESRI ArcMap version 9.2, together with information obtained from Google searches, MapQuest (http://www.mapquest.com/maps/ ), and inspection of aerial photographs of the 2005 Indiana Orthophotography Project.

For match scores greater than 80 percent, plotted locations are generally within several hundred feet of actual locations. For match scores less than 80 percent, horizontal positional accuracy is unknown, so plotted locations may differ from actual locations by large distances.
The vertical positional accuracy was not a factor in the production of this shapefile.

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: The addresses, telephone numbers, and other information for each residential care facility, long-term care facility (nursing home), and hospice was compiled by personnel of the Indiana Geological Survey (IGS) from directories available on the Web site of the Indiana State Department of Health. The address list for residential care facilites was saved as a Microsoft Excel spreadsheet named "RESIDENTIAL_CARE.XLS." The address list for long-term care facilites was saved as a Microsoft Excel spreadsheet named "LONGTERM_CARE.XLS." The address list for hospices was saved as a Microsoft Excel spreadsheet named "HOSPICES.XLS."

gmd:alternateTitle.gco:CharacterString: ISDH Residential Care Directory (http://www.in.gov/isdh/regsvcs/ltc/resdir/wdirres.htm); ISDH Long-Term Care Facility Directory (http://www.in.gov/isdh/regsvcs/ltc/directory/wdirltc.htm), and ISDH Hospice Directory (http://www.in.gov/isdh/regsvcs/acc/hspcdir/wdirhspc.htm).

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: This metadata file was pre-parsed and parsed using CNS (Chew and Spit, v. 2.6.1) and MP (Metadata Parser, v. 2.7.1) software written by Peter N. Schweitzer (U.S. Geological Survey). The errors generated by MP were all addressed and corrected, except that no values were assigned to "Abscissa_Resolution" and "Ordinate_Resolution."

IGS personnel used street information licensed from Tele Atlas in ESRI ArcMap 9.2 to build an "Address Locator." Using the "Geocoding" tool to perform address matching, RESIDENTIAL_CARE.XLS, LONGTERM_CARE.XLS, and HOSPICES.XLS were address- matched. A total of 664 facilities were automatically matched to known addresses. In addition, twenty-eight (28) facilities needed to be manually plotted using the "Editor" tool in ESRI ArcMap, together with locations obtained using Google searches, MapQuest, and inspection of aerial photographs of the 2005 Indiana Orthophotography Project. The output was saved as CARE_LONG_TERM_FACILITIES_ISDH_IN.SHP.
Indiana streets and roads suitable for geocoding

gmd:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: This metadata file is intended to accompany the data set identified and received from the IGS. It is not to be altered or summarized. IGS does not support secondary distribution. If this data set was received from anyone other than the IGS, this metadata file and the data set it describes may lack integrity.

gmd:maintenanceNote.gco:CharacterString: Metadata was created as or translated to ISO 19139 for inclusion in the Big Ten Academic Alliance Geoportal.
